SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 32
Reasoning by the JUF Theory for Working Example
According to the JUF theory,
• To get a desired conclusion, based on Phrase 2, the plaintiﬀmust
ﬁrstly show that:
– The contract with the defendant was established.
– The contract ended because of the sublease to the defendant’s
sister.
• The desired conclusion for the plaintiﬀis obtained without proving
other conditions (such as non-permission) if there were no counter-
arguments,
32
speaker: SYSTEM
